version_description:
- Оформление заказа теперь еще удобнее.
- Добавили возможность заказа в постомат PickPoint.
- Найти точку выдачи заказов на карте стало еще проще.
- Информацию о скидках и специальных предложениях вы можете получать через Viber. Подпишитесь в настройках уведомлений.
- Улучшили функционал "Где мой заказ".
- Улучшили функцию "Где мой заказ".
- Улучшение производительности и исправление ошибок.

Нравится обновление? Будем признательны вашему отзыву в App Store! Есть вопросы или предложения? Пишите нам 24/7 на m.support@utkonos.ru или оставьте отзыв в приложении.

На время Чемпионата Мира по футболу «Утконос» остаётся удобным способом получить продукты и любые другие товары из ассортимента более 40 000 шт. и не стоять в пробках и очередях!

Теперь на главном экране появились:
- ваши отзывы об «Утконос» и отзывы о товарах
- блок «Любимые бренды»
Изменили дизайн добавления адреса и сделали процесс удобнее.

Нравится обновление и наше приложение?
Поделитесь мнением с другими людьми, напишите отзыв в App Store.
Оставляя отзыв, вы помогаете другим людям открыть комфортный сервис интернет-гипермаркета «Утконос»!

Есть вопросы или предложения?
Пишите на m.support@utkonos.ru или оставьте отзыв в приложении.

БЕСПЛАТНО доставим 1-ую и 2-ую покупку при корзине от 1500 рублей, со 2 по 5 заказ дарим скидку 250 руб.
В этом обновлении:
• «История заказов» - теперь удобнее повторить заказ, создать шаблон со списком товаров заказа, выбрать оплату после оформления.
• Добавили возможность построения маршрута от местоположения человека до выбранной точки выдачи заказов.
• Исправлены баги и ошибки.

Исправлен ряд ошибок, спасибо вашим рекомендациям.
Нравится обновление? Будем признательны вашему отзыву в App Store!
Есть вопросы или предложения? Пишите нам 24/7 на m.support@utkonos.ru или оставьте отзыв в приложении.

К выходу iOS 12 готовы!
Все адаптировали, все работает - кайфуйте!

- Понравился новый большой iPhone XS Max или обновлённый дизайн Apple Watch? Их ещё сложно купить, а наше приложение уже готово с ними дружить.
- Узнать, где ваш заказ; получить код для точки выдачи заказа; найти товар – стало удобнее с Siri Shortcuts.
- И множество приятных мелочей и улучшений.

We have made a lot of UI and code improvements. Took users' wishes into consideration. Made the New Year sticker pack. Download and chat in iMessage with your friends, using funny Utkonos stickers.

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

Happy New Year!

С днем рождения, Утконос!
Утконос решает перевернуть все с ног на голову! Теперь подарки получаете вы, а день рождения празднует он!

Интересно? Откройте приложение.

Happy birthday, Utkonos!
Utkonos set out to turn everything upside down! Now you get the gifts and he celebrates his birthday!

Interested? Check our app.

We launched Gastronomic Horoscope!
Update your app for details.

One more thing… Stickers! You can share your emotions using our brand new stickers!

Like the update? Leave feedback on the App Store!
Have questions or suggestions? Please contact us 24/7 by m.support@utkonos.ru or leave feedback in the app.

We’ve added a lot of discounts and promotions!
We’ve also known who Secret Santa is!
Order your «Secret Gift» from the Utkonos and look what is there hidden inside!
And, of course, we’ve got organized before the New Year and fixed bugs.

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

Happy Women’s Day! Utkonos prepared gift sets, toys and sweets for beautiful ladies. Make happy your family and yourself.
Bugfixes and stability improvements.

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

This version improved the display of the weight of goods, communication when paying online and corrected the errors you mentioned.

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

We have updated the goods item card design, and only elated will be able to evaluate and see it)
Also fix bugs and do refactoring. You will not see the changes, but it should work better, developers promise)

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

Optimized authorization elements, adding a shipping address and displaying a basket when adding a product. Don't tell anyone ... a rally starts on April 24th.

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

Little but very important changes. And we continue to raffle prizes!

If you like this update we would be appreciate to have your review on the App Store!
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

Added the ability to use the VkusVill loyalty card. Optimized catalog and cart. Added a screen with all active stocks. And many other changes that are not visible)
Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us 24/7 at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

Now you can easily cook according to our recipes, adding goods to the cart with one touch. There are segues from the main screen to categories such as «discount», «new», «buyers’ choice». The delivery area has increased. And if you checkout an order before 14:00 you will get it on the same day (unfortunately it’s available not for all addresses, but don’t be sad, we’re working on it).

Have you any questions or suggestions? Contact us at m.support@utkonos.ru or leave a feedback in the app.

P.S. I hope somebody reads this LOL

The app has become even more convenient and better. The new update has improved existing features and work speed.
Update the app and get:
Minor bugs fixed in navigation, favorites and shopping cart recommendations.
Also Utkonos prolong the discount and free shipping for the first order.
Any questions or suggestions? Write on m.support@utkonos.ru or leave feedback in the app.

Long-awaited update!
Now you can buy food and other stuff even faster! Our app became much more convenient. We worked hard on visual and functional bugs and tried our best to fix them. We thank everyone who is already using our app. P. S. In July weekends the delivery is less expensive than in the rest of the week, or even free.
Any questions or suggestions? Write on m.support@utkonos.ru or leave feedback in the app.

What’s new?
Fixed bugs and worked hard to put on speed of the App. Now it’s faster than an airplane! Talking about airplanes: feels like it’s time for us to book the vacation, huh?))
Any questions or suggestions? Write on m.support@utkonos.ru or leave feedback in the app.
Utkonos started in Tula, Kaluga and Tver! New promotions and seasonal discounts. Have a nice shopping!

Are you ready for iOS 13)
Authorization via Apple ID has become even more convenient, we will please fans of dark design, and wish you a pleasant shopping!
And yet, at your request, you can now see the electronic check in the paid order.

And gifts and surprises for you!
Now you can make a note of the delivery time "I agree to receive earlier", if it is convenient for you.
Enjoy your shopping :)
And gifts and surprises for you!
And gifts and surprises for you!

New Year is coming soon! It's time to choose gifts :)
What's in this update? If you forgot to leave a comment to the courier, you can add while he goes to you. Select the application icon in the profile settings / appearance. For those who upgraded to iOS 13, a dark theme control is available in the profile. We wish you N good purchases N happy holidays!

New Year is coming soon! It's time to choose gifts :)
What's in this update? If you forgot to leave a comment to the courier, you can add while he goes to you. Select the application icon in the profile settings / appearance. For those who upgraded to iOS 13, a dark theme control is available in the profile. We wish you N good purchases N happy holidays!
We improved searching to make it easier for you to find everything you need! Now the voice searching and the barcode scanning and searching for a whole list of products become more convenient.
We improved application stability.

We introduced contactless door-to-door delivery for online prepaid orders. Just indicate in the comments to the order that it must be left at the door. Updated filters in the search, improved the stability of the application, fixed bugs. Updated stickers for iMessage :)

We have introduced contactless shipping for prepaid online orders - the option "Leave at the door". We have added a new type of pick-up point - "In the trunk", the order can be picked up on the way out of our car. New types of delivery are available on the tab "Checkout".
Pleasant shopping :)

We have improved the stability of the application, made small corrections to facilitate the process of ordering.
We recruit new people every day to meet the increased demand. Have a nice shopping experience!

The section of the offer became more convenient, now there is a filter on categories of the goods. The application works even more stably! At the order, if you do not see available intervals, it means they have ended. Collect your cart in advance and try to place an order later. Several times a day we open access to a new day of delivery - the interval can be available the next day. Enjoy your shopping :)

The application works even more stable! When placing an order, if you do not see the available intervals, it means they are over. Collect your shopping cart in advance and try to place an order later. Several times a day we access a new day of delivery - the interval may be available the next day. Enjoy your shopping :)

We have opened service Utkonos MINI with additional delivery options to make it easier and more comfortable for you to order everything you need.
And also, we have a new variant of self-delivery - "In the trunk", all details in the app ;).
Enjoy your shopping!
Now the delivery from Utkonos MINI is from 3 hours. Make an order in the morning and get the goods by lunch - so easy and fast! Pleasant shopping ;-)
Now the delivery from Utkonos MINI is from 3 hours. Make an order in the morning and get the goods by lunch - so easy and fast! Pleasant shopping ;-)
Now the delivery from Utkonos MINI is from 3 hours. Make an order in the morning and get the goods by lunch - so easy and fast! Pleasant shopping ;-)

Delivery from 2 hours throughout Moscow! Utkonos MINI :)
Pleasant shopping!

Delivery from 2 hours throughout Moscow! Utkonos MINI :)
Pleasant shopping!

We have launched our own loyalty program Utkonos Club! Copy U-bonuses and pay with them up to 99% of your purchase!
Now you can track courier on the map in real time.
Added a filter in the history of orders by year and status.
Added a filter by category in purchased items.
Added ability to edit and delete reviews.

We have launched our own loyalty program Utkonos Club! Copy U-bonuses and pay with them up to 99% of your purchase!
Now you can track courier on the map in real time.
Added a filter in the history of orders by year and status.
Added a filter by category in purchased items.
Added ability to edit and delete reviews.

- Authorization in the application became even more convenient! Now you can register and login with the SMS.
- The first buyers from St. Petersburg have already appreciated the range and convenience of Utkonos ONLINE! You can also make your order to the Northern Capital.
- Utkonos ONLINE celebrates its anniversary - we are 20 years old! Come and find out what we have prepared for you!
